relationship: It establishes that in other to provide relief from unintended hardships caused by lifetime, the law allow for modification
citation_text: The fact that a party chose not to appeal an initial maintenance award has no bearing on the ability to seek modification.

relationship: It was established that the statute permitting modification of a maintenance award is RCW 26.09.170(1).
citation_text: This provision allows a court to modify a maintenance award when the moving party shows a substantial change in circumstances that the parties did not contemplate at the time of the dissolution decree.
